name: IMPERIAL INVASION
description:
Defend your burning goblin village from the imperial conquerors! No goblin works alone, though! Fight with your friend and use your weapons together to slay the incoming hordes of castle knights! How long can you hold out?

ControlsActionWASDMove (Player 1)
Left Ctrl
Attack (Player 1)
QSquawk (Player 1)
IJKLMove (Player 2)
SpaceAttack (Player 2)
OSquawk (Player 2)
